Welcome to HyRech - Hydrate and Recharge! We are thrilled to have you on board for a healthier lifestyle. Our app customizes drink reminders based on your profile and the weather.
This is Hyrech, your assistant that will guide you along to better and healthier life.

In this application, the drink reminder will be based on the user\'s weight and height and the current weather. This application will send notifications to the user to remind them to drink water and to record their water intake by the users.
